comments.text:
Alright my friends… I want to know 👀 Which truth hit a little too close to home?

And more importantly… what room in your house is frustrating you RIGHT NOW? Tell me what’s not working. I read these comments and they inspire future videos because my whole goal is to help YOU create a home you truly love. 

So…let’s talk about it. RR
comments.author: @rebeccarobeson1

comments.text: I love when you do these for people - I learn so much and you are so right every time 👍👍❤️❤️

comments.text: Hello Rebecca!! Oh my goodness I was shocked watching your new video today.. I saw my consultation with you about my entertainment center. I have been with you from your first youtube video's to design sessions member.  It has been the BEST investment ever!! I have to say that even after learning many of your principals having our consultation reaffirmed many ideas I had and you gave sooo many more ideas!!! The design consultation was the best investment I have ever  done!! And Rebecca you are AHHHHmazing !!!  Beautiful soul inside and out!!

comments.text: Amazing video! I have the same plant that is sitting over your counter. Your pot has a metallic sheen to it ❤️
comments.author: @ingeborgbryce4197

comments.text: Love this video! I have used several of your design tips! My favorite is the one when you went to that young mom’s home and did the 3 big mirrors on the dining room wall! I headed right over to  Hobby Lobby with the intention of getting the same ones for above my couch on a vaulted wall. Instead, I got 6 square pieces and stacked them 2 high and 3 wide. Amazing! I never would have thought of this if you hadn’t posted that video with the 3 mirrors!
comments.author: @Jaclynjillcarroll

comments.text: Every time I see you, you look more amazing than before. Been following you for 3 years and taken tips to incorporate into my home. You are an inspiration❤.
